Module project
Package model

Class Effect

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Effect
  • public class Effect
extends java.lang.Object
    A effect of a weapon. Both base effects and advanced effects are made of this class, since there is no difference in behaviour. An effect can have a cost, a strategy that defines the possible targets, how much damage and marks does, and the possibility of moving the player or some targets.
